1350530.name: Xmas Presents
1350530.description:
Santa's Elves have turned against him! Dodge the Xmas Presents for as long as possible to gain points and achieve high scores.

Xmas Presents is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while being bombarded with presents. Use the arrow keys or WASD Keys to avoid exploding presents and keep your lives for as long as possible. It's sure to be an explosively good time!

  • High-scores
  • Explosions
  • Blimps
1350530.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
